title: How to Contact Expedia Customer Service: By Phone, Email, or Online

steps.title: Call Expedia’s toll-free number at (800) 319-4834.
steps.content: Call Expedia’s toll-free number at (800) 319-4834. Once your call is answered, follow the prompt instructions for the initial questions. Then, type your itinerary number as prompted, or press 4 and wait for someone to assist you. The calls are answered in the order that they are received, so wait times can vary. If you are outside of the United States, call +1 (404) 728-8787. If you speak another language, contact Expedia representatives from your country. Check the Contact Us section on Expedia’s website to find your country’s contact number. Be careful when searching for Expedia’s customer service number online. If you spot grammatical errors or unusual language, be careful. Scammers may use fake numbers to trick you into sending them money. [1] X Trustworthy Source Better Business Bureau Nonprofit organization dedicated to promoting marketplace trustworthiness by educating consumers and reviewing businesses Go to source

steps.title: Email Expedia at travel@chat.expedia.com.
steps.content: Email Expedia at travel@chat.expedia.com. Whether you need help with your traveling or are looking to resolve an issue, contacting Expedia via email can be a great way to get any problems ironed out. Email travel@chat.expedia.com with information on what’s going on and wait for them to respond. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Chat with Expedia’s AI Chatbot on their website.
steps.content: Chat with Expedia’s AI Chatbot on their website. Get in touch with Expedia’s AI chatbot by visiting their website and clicking the Help Button in the lower right-hand corner. This will open the chatbot’s menu and allow you to speak about any travel issues. The AI chatbot is designed to assist you with any travel-related needs. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Expedia app and select the message icon in the right-hand corner.
steps.content: Open the Expedia app and select the message icon in the right-hand corner. To get in touch with a customer service representative, open the Expedia mobile app and select the blue message icon in the lower right-hand corner. This will connect you with their virtual chatbot. From there, let the bot know that you’d like to talk to a representative. Then, describe your issue so the bot can connect you with the best person to assist you.

steps.title: Tweet at Expedia via the handle @ExpediaHelp.
steps.content: Tweet at Expedia via the handle @ExpediaHelp. On X (formerly Twitter), @ExpediaHelp is available for 24-hour, 7 days-a-week support. Simply write your issue in a tweet or direct message and send it to the account. However, you’re not guaranteed to receive a response, and you sometimes may have to wait anywhere from a few hours to a few days for a reply.

steps.title: If you’re using the Expedia Chatbot, you’ll get an immediate response.
steps.content: If you’re using the Expedia Chatbot, you’ll get an immediate response. Once you sign into your account on the Expedia website, click the Help button in the lower right-hand corner to get in touch with Expedia’s chatbot. Powered by AI, the chatbot responds immediately and can assist you with any needs related to travel. [4] X Research source

steps.title: If you’re calling Expedia, wait times can be anywhere from 1 to 30 minutes.
steps.content: If you’re calling Expedia, wait times can be anywhere from 1 to 30 minutes. If you call Expedia, you may have to wait anywhere from 1 to 30 minutes, depending on how busy they are. The usual wait time is typically 3 to 12 minutes, but it varies. On extremely busy days, you may have to wait longer than 30 minutes to get a response.

steps.title: Expedia customer service is busiest on Fridays and least busy on Sundays.
steps.content: Expedia customer service is busiest on Fridays and least busy on Sundays. On Fridays, Expedia tends to receive a higher volume of calls. Their hold times tend to be shorter than other days, but you still may have to wait a long time in the call queue before a representative is able to assist you due to the volume of the calls. Hold times tend to be longer on Sunday since Expedia tends to be less busy, but the call queue is typically shorter than it is on other days. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Yes, Expedia offers the One Key rewards program and seasonal promotions.
steps.content: Yes, Expedia offers the One Key rewards program and seasonal promotions. The program is called One Key, and it allows you to earn OneKeyCash, which you can use to pay for travel, activities, and other benefits. As a member of One Key, you receive 2% back on bookings made through Expedia, Vrbo, or Hotels.com. Flights that aren’t part of a package only earn 0.2% back. [6] X Research source Maximize your amount of points by booking with the Expedia app, as it doubles your points. Use the points to save money on car rentals, vacation rentals, cruises, hotels, and vacation packages. [7] X Research source Be on the lookout for promotional emails, too, as they can help you save money on your trip through discounts or promotion codes. Sometimes, you may be able to receive double, triple, or quadruple points that go towards your OneKeyCash [8] X Research source

steps.title: Does Expedia offer 24-hour customer service?
steps.content: Does Expedia offer 24-hour customer service? Yes, Expedia’s customer service representatives are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. You can use their chatbot or contact a real customer service representative any time of the day.

steps.title: Can I get a refund from Expedia?
steps.content: Can I get a refund from Expedia? Getting a refund with Expedia depends on the service provider's policy. Some airlines and hotels offer refunds, while others don’t. Request a refund for a refundable flight using the “My Trips” section. If the service is non-refundable, they may still offer you compensation through credits or upgrades. The cancellation rules for vacation packages are typically based on the services included. Different flights, hotels, and car rentals have different refund policies. Contact Expedia customer service to determine whether your services are refundable or not.

steps.title: How do I initiate a dispute with Expedia?
steps.content: How do I initiate a dispute with Expedia? Call Expedia customer service and explain your situation. If you can’t resolve the issue with Expedia, call your credit card company’s customer service and explain your situation. They will work to assist you with the issue. [9] X Research source

steps.title: How do I check my booking on Expedia?
steps.content: How do I check my booking on Expedia? Log into your Expedia account on the website or app. Go to the table of contents and click “My Trips.” Scroll through the “My Trips” page and look for your booking.

steps.title: What do I do if my Expedia booking isn’t showing up?
steps.content: What do I do if my Expedia booking isn’t showing up? If your booking isn’t showing up, check your email for a confirmation number. Don’t forget to check your spam. [10] X Research source Log into the website and make sure you’re logged into the right account, then head to the “My Trips” section to double-check if your booking is there. If you still can’t find the booking, contact Expedia customer service.

steps.title: How does Expedia protect my personal data?
steps.content: How does Expedia protect my personal data? Expedia abides by privacy protection laws and takes various security measures to protect your data. They do collect your personal information, though, which they use to communicate with you, provide you with information and services, and comply with the law. [11] X Research source

steps.title: What are Expedia's terms of service?
steps.content: What are Expedia's terms of service? Expedia says that you must use their services for personal, lawful purposes, take actions to protect your account, and provide information that is accurate and truthful. Fake bookings and unauthorized use and misuse of Expedia services are prohibited. If you make a booking on behalf of others, it is your responsibility. [12] X Research source

steps.title: What brands does Expedia own?
steps.content: What brands does Expedia own? Expedia’s parent company, Expedia Group, owns Hotels.com, eLong, Travelocity.com, Orbitz, CarRentals.com, HotWire, Vrbo, Trivago, Expedia Cruises, Wotif, Classic Vacations, and a host of other companies. [13] X Research source
